conclusion: No violation of Article 14+P1-2 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Right to education-{general});Violation of Article 14+P1-2 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Right to education-{general});Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
judges: Guido Raimondi;Nebojša Vučinić;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque;Peer Lorenzen
scl: Ali v. the United Kingdom, no 40385/06, § 53, 11 January 2011;Andrejeva v. Latvia [GC], no 55707/00, § 82, ECHR 2009;Case "relating to certain aspects of the laws on the use of languages in education in Belgium" v. Belgium (merits), 23 July 1968, §§ 5, Series A no 6;Leyla Sahin v. Turkey [GC], no 44774/98, ECHR 2005-XI;Lukach v. Russia (dec.), no 48041/99, 16 November 1999;Mürsel Eren v. Turkey, no 60856/00, § 40-41, ECHR 2006-II;Sejdic and Finci v. Bosnia and Herzegovina [GC], nos. 27996/06 and 34836/06, § 42, ECHR 2009
